comments:
Right clicking on an unmapped collection of an unannotated class in the JPA Structure view and selecting "Add to XML" results in and NPE. This leaves the JPA Structure view out of sync with orm.xml.  It now thinks the collection field has been added to orm.xml but it has not.  If you the add the collection field to the orm.xml manually you get two attribute nodes under the entity in the JPA Structure view.  Closing and reopening the JPA Structure view does not remove the multiple node problem.
